data.title: London Biggin Hill Airport
data.meta_description:
London Biggin Hill Airport | 8,026 followers on LinkedIn. London Biggin Hill - the fastest touchdown to downtown of any London airport

London Biggin Hill Airport (EGKB) is just 12 miles from central London and offers award winning VIP handling, a choice of FBOâ€™s (Biggin Hill Executive Handling & Signature Flight Support), extensive hangarage, support and maintenance services for all ranges of business jets.  

A designated UK Port of Entry, no runway slots and an exclusive 6 minute helicopter transfer service to and from the heart of London. 

Welcome to London Biggin Hill, Londonâ€™s fast track gateway.

From engineering to air traffic control and piloting, there are a range of career pathways waiting to be explored! Applications can be made online via our website, and must be completed by the individual interested in participating â¡ï¸ https://lnkd.in/eVPStQ9p Applications close at 10pm on Monday 23rd September. Successful applicants will be invited to attend an interview at the airport. On 18th August 1940, the Hardest Day of the Battle of Britain was fought in the skies above our country. We remember, with pride and gratitude, Churchillâ€™s Few who flew with skill and courage throughout the Battle of Britain, supported by dedicated crews and operational staff. As London Biggin Hill embraces the future, we are incredibly proud to honour our rich history, and the role RAF Biggin Hill served as Winston Churchillâ€™s â€˜Strongest Linkâ€™. Today, The Strongest Link Garden stands abeam the main approach of our runway and serves as a reflective tribute to all those who sacrificed so much â€“ continuing to tell the story of our heritage to future generations. Discover more â¡ï¸ https://lnkd.in/e5hXN_cx #TheHardestDay #BattleofBritain #BigginHill #Heritage #StrongestLinkGarden #Spitfires #Hurricanes

Congratulations to Bombardier for being voted #1, among all business jet manufacturers, in Aviation International News' 2024 Product Support Survey. The accolade is a real testament to the teamâ€™s dedication to providing a world-class support and services experience, ensuring customers are at the centre of everything they do. We are proud to have Bombardier as part of our ecosystem of aerospace businesses here at London Biggin Hill Airport, providing industry-leading services to our global customer base. #BizAv #LondonBigginHill #Bombardier

In South East London Chamber of Commerceâ€™s latest issue of The Masthead, our CEO, David Winstanley MA FRAeS shares how business aviation airports play a crucial role in the future by supporting innovation, skills development and job creation. Here at London Biggin Hill Airport, we have forged strong connections with the public and private sectors, working closely with all parties to generate skilled jobs and drive responsible economic growth, while supporting our local community and honouring the airportâ€™s historic status. Read the article on pages 16 & 17 in The Masthead â¡ï¸ https://lnkd.in/euf-A-_U #BizAv #BusinessAviation #LondonBigginHill #Jobs #EconomicGrowth #Innovation #Skills

Congratulations to BIGGIN HILL HERITAGE HANGAR LTD who have just returned their sixteenth Spitfire to the air! MK912 took its maiden post-restoration flight from London Biggin Hill earlier this week; almost nine years to the day since its last flight on 1st August 2015. The aircraft proudly carries the markings of 312 Squadron (Czech) which it wore on D-Day, flown by P/O Miroslav â€˜Tonyâ€™ Liskutin DFC. He was believed to be the first allied fighter pilot to land in France on 6th June 1944. Biggin Hill Heritage Hangar is home to the largest gathering of Spitfires in the world and is at the forefront of heritage restoration. You can also fly in one of their two-seat Spitfires from the most famous RAF fighter station of World War Two. Discover more â¡ï¸ https://lnkd.in/eWd-ae_m #Heritage #Spitfires #BigginHill Flyaspitfire.com

ğ—œğ˜'ğ˜€ ğ—§ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—² ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—•ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ Our Commercial Director, Robert Walters FRAeS, was honoured to attend the BBGA British Business and General Aviation Association reception at the House of Commons last night. The prestigious event brought together over 200 industry professionals for an opportunity to meet with Ministers, MPs and other Government officials to demonstrate the value of business aviation in driving economic growth for the UK and Europe. As the providers of the path and gateway to the UK economy, facilitating billions of pounds of inward investment, our industry employs thousands of people, directly and indirectly in the communities where we are located. A new independent economic study, by Lichfields, showcases how far London Biggin Hill Airport has come in the last decade, and its significant role in driving positive economic change, investment and employment. The data highlights that for every 1,000 business air traffic movements, 88 FTE jobs are supported and Â£6.47 million GVA is generated â€“ injecting tangible benefits into the local and national economies. Discover more here: https://lnkd.in/eVAzYqvN #BizAv #BusinessAviation #Aviation #TimeForBusiness

Congratulations to Bombardier on their record-breaking flight from London Biggin Hill Airport to Montreal, powered by Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF)! Did you know, Air bpâ€™s low carbon renewable fuel, which is produced from waste and residue products, provides a lifecycle carbon reduction of around 80% compared to the traditional jet fuel it replaces. As the first airport in London to offer SAF, this flight marks another significant milestone in our sustainability journey, as we actively work towards our goal of becoming a carbon neutral airport by 2029, whilst also enabling our customers and resident businesses to meet their own sustainability goals. #LondonBigginHill #SustainableAviationFuel #Bombardier #BizAv #SAF #Aviation

This week, weâ€™ve hosted 15 students for our annual work experience week. The initiative aims to inspire local young people by showcasing the diverse career opportunities available here at London Biggin Hill Airport. The students visited several departments to gain hands-on experience in different fields of aviation â€“ including Customer Service, Ground Operations, Rescue & Firefighting and Air Traffic Control. We are passionate about supporting the next generation of aviation professionals by providing them with the tools to unlock their potential. Our work experience opportunity runs during a dedicated week every year, in addition to our two â€˜Futures Weeksâ€™ and other initiatives. Discover more: https://lnkd.in/eS3dyJYN #Aviation #AviationCareers #STEM #LondonBigginHill #WorkExperience #Airport #EarlyCareers #NextGen #BizAv #AirportCareers
